description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Olympique Lyonnais vs Toulouse in the Ligue 1
title: Olympique Lyonnais vs Toulouse: Ligue 1 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Olympique Lyonnais vs Toulouse: Ligue 1 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 2 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Shavy Babicka (Toulouse) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Cristian Cásseres with a cross following a set piece situation.
Post
Attempt saved. Corentin Tolisso (Lyon) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Post
Attempt saved. Nicolás Tagliafico (Lyon) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Nemanja Matic with a headed pass.
